text: Anata gata shinkō suru mono yo, kenkyo ni kaigo shite arrā ni kaere. Osoraku omo wa, anata gata no samazamana aku o harai, kawa ga shita o nagareru rakuen ni haira serudearou. Sonohi arrā wa, yogen-sha ya kare ni shitagatte shinjiru-sha-tachi o, katajikena shime wa shinai. Kare-ra no hikari wa, sono zenpō matawa ukata ni hiramekou. Kare-ra wa (inotte) iudearou. `Omo yo, watashi-tachi no tame ni, hikari o kanzen ni nasa re, watashi-tachi o o yurushi kudasai. Anata wa subete no koto ni zen'nō de ara remasu
